title: Atom UI - A Repository Of The Best UI Designs For Inspiration
body: Atom UI is a design inspiration platform designed specifically to showcase the best UI designs on the internet. All the designs are carefully handpicked to deliver better designs to you.

title: Toastify JS - Better notification messages
body: Toastify is a lightweight, vanilla JS toast notification library. It is highly performant and customizable, supporting multiple stacked notifications.
